lead_paragraph: WIESEL--Elie. The Board of Directors of American Friends of the Open University of Israel mourns the loss of their esteemed fellow Board Member Elie Wiesel. His kindness, his warmth, his wit and his wisdom are irreplaceable. A true Messenger of Peace, his passing leaves an empty place in our hearts. He will be greatly missed by all who have known and loved him. Ingeborg Rennert, President Naomi Hass-Perlman, Chairman 1/3
